SEO_TITLE: Gaeluss | Innovation in Custom Software Development
SEO_DESCRIPTION: Gaeluss offers innovative custom software development solutions for companies looking to optimize processes and digitally transform their business. Experts in web and mobile applications with a focus on quality and efficiency.
SEO_KEYWORDS: software development, web development, mobile applications, UI/UX design, technology consulting, application development, technology solutions, software company, software creation, frontend development, backend development, cross-platform applications

ABOUT.TITLE: About Gaeluss
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: Gaeluss is a software development company committed to innovation and quality. Our focus is on providing efficient technology solutions to help companies achieve their goals.
ABOUT.SUBTITLE: Vision and Values:
ABOUT.LIST_1: Constant innovation to stay at the forefront of technology.
ABOUT.LIST_2: Quality in every detail of our work, ensuring reliable solutions.
ABOUT.LIST_3: Transparency and ethics in our relationships with clients and collaborators.
ABOUT.LIST_4: Client-centered approach to understand and meet their expectations.
ABOUT.LIST_5: Collaboration as the foundation for building successful projects.

SERVICES.TITLE: Our Services
SERVICES.WEB_DEVELOPMENT_DESCRIPTION: We create high-quality web applications using modern technologies such as React, Astro, and more.
SERVICES.MOBILE_DEVELOPMENT_DESCRIPTION: Creation of cross-platform mobile applications with an intuitive design that provides the best user experience.
SERVICES.DESIGN_DESCRIPTION: Our team focuses on user-friendly interface design that prioritizes user experience and engagement.
SERVICES.CONSULTING_DESCRIPTION: We offer consulting services to help you choose the technology solutions suited to your company's needs.

PREFOOTER.TITLE: Ready to bring your ideas to life?
PREFOOTER.DESCRIPTION: At Gaeluss, we transform your ideas into impactful digital solutions.

FOOTER.DESCRIPTION: Innovative software solutions for web and mobile. We create technology that enhances your business.
